description: Avoid containers that disable text wrapping and force horizontal scrolling.
recommendation: Allow text to wrap or break long strings so content can reflow at narrow widths and high zoom. (WCAG 2.1 SC 1.4.10)
algorithm: Detects white-space: nowrap/pre in inline styles or XAML TextWrapping="NoWrap".
algorithm_advanced: Flags white-space:nowrap/pre in inline styles or XAML TextWrapping=NoWrap.
